#include<cstdio>
#include<cmath>
#define mod 8388608

using namespace std;

int main()
{
        int testCases;
            scanf("%d",&testCases);
                
                while(testCases--)
                        {
                                    long long int N;
                                            long long int subsetSummation=0;
                                                    
                                                    scanf("%lld",&N);    
                                                        
                                                            if(N>23)
                                                                            printf("8388607\n");
                                                                    else{
                                                                                    while(N!=0)
                                                                                                    {
                                                                                                                        long long int NPower = pow(2,N-1);
                                                                                                                                        long long int summation = (N*(N+1)/2);
                                                                                                                                                
                                                                                                                                                        subsetSummation += (NPower*summation);
                                                                                                                                                                        subsetSummation = subsetSummation%mod;
                                                                                                                                                                                        N--;
                                                                                                                                                                                                    }
                                                                            printf("%lld\n",subsetSummation);
                                                                                                
                                                                                            }
                                                                            
                                                                                }


                    return 0;

}
